bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Therapeutic Approach causing a fetus to emaciate to ease birth. LSZ considers this to be a method to ease delivery by making sluggish qi pass in a woman who experiences qi stagnation prior to delivery. Fu ren da quan liang Gynecological book. Southern Song fang era, 1237. 婦人大全良方 16: 瘦胎易產，胡陽公主每產累日不下， 南山道士進此方 , “ To thin a fetus and ease delivery: each time when the princess of Huyang gave birth and [the child] failed to descend for several days, the Daoist of Nanshan gave this recipe”.
